attributes.action: call in the police to deal with fraudulent expenses claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These MP's should face the full force of the law

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
